channel.title: data on Petros Papapanagiotou
channel.description: Recent content in data on Petros Papapanagiotou

item.title: Workflow Analysis & Enactment
item.description: A big part of my research is AI-enabled analysis and deployment of workflows, both in simulation and live. This includes concurrent enactment, decentralised architectures, and discrete event simulation.

item.title: Internet of Things
item.description: I am interested in the use of sensor and workflow data for live monitoring and short- and long-term deviation detection to improve operational decision support. This involves performing complex event processing and conformance checking under uncertainty.
